product.name: Cateraide™ IT End Loading Insulated Food Pan Carrier

description.html:
• Insulated Interior – Keeps food hot or cold up to 6+ hours
  • Top Loading Design – Configured for convenient filling, transporting and cleaning
  • Sturdy Construction – Made of ultra-strong plastic which will endure bustling food service environments
  • Versatile
    Pan Capacity – Fits (6) full size 2.5” deep food pans, (12) half size
    2.5” deep food pans, (4) full size 4” deep food pans or (8) half size 4”
    deep food pans
  • Stackable – Designed to stack and fit together for secure transport and storing
  • Sleek Edge – Designed with a sleek, durable surface which resists wear and blends in with a variety of events
